text: "Respect" is a song written and originally released by American recording artist Otis Redding in 1965. The song became a 1967 hit and signature song for soul singer Aretha Franklin. In Franklin's version, the song is about a woman who wants her husband's respect. Franklin's version adds the "R-E-S-P-E-C-T" chorus and the backup singers'. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:1967 songs Category:Otis Redding songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Ike & Tina Turner songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Respect (song)
